name: @darlean/persistence-suite
description: Persistence Suite that provides the generic Persistence Service that can be used to persist data

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run lint
scripts.preversion: npm run format && npm install && npm run lint
scripts.version: git add -A src && git add package.json && git add ../../package-lock.json && git -C ../.. tag persistence-suite-%npm_package_version%
scripts.postversion: git commit -m "Version upgrade to persistence-suite-%npm_package_version%" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.precommit: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.doc: npx typedoc --skipErrorChecking --json typedoc-out.json &  npx docgen typedoc-out.json ./docs/

author: Theo van der Donk
